import React,{useState,useContext}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate,Link}from'react-router-dom';import{AuthContext}from'../protected/AuthContext';import Navbar from'../components/Navbar';import'./Login.css';import LoginImage from'../components/Paisaje.jpg';// Asegúrate de tener la ruta correcta para la imagen
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginPage=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const{login}=useContext(AuthContext);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/users/login',{email,password});const token=response.data.token;const userData=JSON.parse(atob(token.split('.')[1]));login(token,userData);if(userData.rolID===2){navigate('/admin');}else{navigate('/products');}}catch(error){setError('Invalid email or password');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"PetStore"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Introduce tus datos a continuaci\xF3n"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),placeholder:"Email",required:true,className:"login-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),placeholder:"Password",required:true,className:"login-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"login-button",children:"Login"})]}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"error-message",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"register-prompt",children:["\xBFNo tienes una cuenta? ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/register",children:"Reg\xEDstrate"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:LoginImage,alt:""})})]})})})]});};export default LoginPage;
